CommonPart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Provides common information about a content item, such as Owner, Date Created, Date Published and Date Modified.

LastModifier.NumericField.DisplayName: Id of last user that have modified the content item

AutoroutePart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Adds advanced url configuration options to your content type to completely customize the url pattern for a content item.

BodyPart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Allows the editing of text using an editor provided by the configured flavor (e.g. html, text, markdown).

IdentityPart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Automatically generates a unique identity for the content item, which is required in import/export scenarios where one content item references another.

TitlePart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Provides a Title for your content item.

LocalizationPart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Provides the user interface to localize content items.

SocialPart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Provides a group of fields for social data

Facebook.InputField.InputFieldSettings.Hint: Inserire un indirizzo Facebook valido (preceduto da http://).

Twitter.InputField.InputFieldSettings.Hint: Inserire un indirizzo Twitter valido (preceduto da http://).

Instagram.InputField.InputFieldSettings.Hint: Inserire un indirizzo Instragram valido (preceduto da http://).

Pinterest.InputField.InputFieldSettings.Hint: Inserire un indirizzo Pinterest valido (preceduto da http://).

ContactPart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Provides a group of fields for contact data

SitoWeb.InputField.InputFieldSettings.Hint: Inserire un indirizzo web valido (preceduto da http://).

Telefono.InputField.InputFieldSettings.Hint: Inserire il numero di telefono come sequenza di cifre senza spazi (il primo carattere può essere il segno +).
